feed.title: Habitica Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.4 Logging Fix and June Content
entry.content:
API

  • Content: New items and cosmetics for June 2025 (@CuriousMagpie)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Don't send empty err events from Vue error logger (@SabreCat)

Scripts

  • Perf: Use string literal email query instead of regex when deleting accounts for GDPR compliance (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.5 Performance Fixes Etc
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Improved efficiency on two queries, one for parties and one for tasks (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: Correct string variable interpolation on Soft White Suit equipment (@CuriousMagpie)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Repo

  • Chore: Bump some package versions per @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.6 Vite
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Feature: Update and clean up some outdated static pages (@phillipthelen)
  • Refactor: Move to Vite for preparing client files (@phillipthelen)
  • Fix: Correct logo showing in wrong color on password reset page (@CuriousMagpie)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.37.0 July Content and Date Adjustments
entry.content:
API

  • Content: New items, backgrounds, etc for July 2025 (@CuriousMagpie and @beffymaroo)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)
  • Chore: Adjust event and sale dates for better match to user activity (@CuriousMagpie and @SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.37.1 Performance and TT Fixes
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Update Time Travelers shop to display seasonal backgrounds (@CuriousMagpie)
  • Fix: Correct syntax in Sprite component that was filing lots of Vue errors (@phillipthelen)

Scripts

  • Perf: Update Group Plan cron process to use a simpler query and filter found groups post hoc (@SabreCat)
